column1: #: description: The ratio of the production cross sections of inclusive $\Lambda_{c}^{+}$ to prompt $D^{0}$ versus $p_{T}$ from pp collisions. The $20\%$ normalization uncertainty in pp collisions is not included in the statistical and systematic uncertainties for each data point.
#: keyword reactions: P P --> LAMBDAc+ --> P+ + K- + PI+
#: keyword phrase: proton-proton | the ratio of the production cross sections of inclusive LAMBDAc to prompt D0
